text: Oscar de la Hoya (born February 4, 1973), also known as the "Golden Boy", is a former boxer. He is Mexican-American. He won a gold medal for the United States at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Site, Golden Boy Promotions Category:American boxers Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:International Boxing Hall of Fame inductees
title: Oscar De La Hoya
